vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: ev.ron (עֶבְרֹן "Ebron" H5683)
§ Abdon = "servile"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a judge of Israel in the time of the judges; perhaps the same as 'Bedan'
2) a Benjamite, son of Shashak
3) a Gibeonite, son of Jehiel and a grandson of Gideon
4) son of Micah in the time of king Josiah of Judah; also 'Achbor'
n pr loc
5) a city in Asher allotted to the Gershonite Levites; located 10 miles (16 km) north of Accho; modern 'Abdeh'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) עֶבְרוֹן   ciudad; para los levitas; territorio de Aser; (b)   hijo de Hilel; juez de Israel; (c)   hijo de Sasac; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   hijo de Jehiel; tribu de Benjamín; (e)   hijo de Micaías; funcionario; en tiempos de Josías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
押頓 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "屈從的"
陽性專有名詞
1) 士師時代的一位以色列士師; 或許與'比但'相同 (士 12:13-15)
2) 便雅憫人, 沙煞的兒子 (代上 8:23-25)
3) 基遍人, 耶利的兒子也是基遍的孫子 (代上8:30,9:36)
4) 在猶大約西亞王時代米迦的兒子(代下 34:20); 也是 '亞革波' (王下 22:12)
專有名詞 地名
5) 在亞設的城巿而被分配給革順利未人; 位於亞柯北方
十英哩 (十六公里) ; 現今 'Abdeh'
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
押顿 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "屈从的"
阳性专有名词
1) 士师时代的一位以色列士师; 或许与'比但'相同 (士 12:13-15)
2) 便雅悯人, 沙煞的儿子 (代上 8:23-25)
3) 基遍人, 耶利的儿子也是基遍的孙子 (代上8:30,9:36)
4) 在犹大约西亚王时代米迦的儿子(代下 34:20); 也是 '亚革波' (王下 22:12)
专有名词 地名
5) 在亚设的城巿而被分配给革顺利未人; 位于亚柯北方
十英哩 (十六公里) ; 现今 'Abdeh'

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.12.13;
son of: Hillel (H1985)
§ Abdon = "servile"
n pr m
1) a judge of Israel in the time of the judges; perhaps the same as 'Bedan'
2) a Benjamite, son of Shashak
3) a Gibeonite, son of Jehiel and a grandson of Gideon
4) son of Micah in the time of king Josiah of Judah; also 'Achbor'
n pr loc
5) a city in Asher allotted to the Gershonite Levites; located 10 miles (16 km) north of Accho; modern 'Abdeh'

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.23;
son of: Shashak (H8349);
brother of: Ishpan (H3473), Eber (H5677J), Eliel (H0447I), Zichri (H2147I), Hanan (H2605), Hananiah (H2608O), Elam (H5867), Anthothijah (H6070), Iphdeiah (H3301) and Penuel (H6439I)

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.30;
son of: Abiel (H0022) and Maacah (H4601N);
brother of: Kish (H7027), Ner (H5369), Zur (H6698I), Baal (H1168B), Nadab (H5070J), Gedor (H1446I), Ahio (H0283I), Zecher (H2144) and Mikloth (H4732)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.22.12;
son of: Micaiah (H4320);
father of: Elnathan (H0494K); also called Abdon at 2Ch.34.20;
Another name of akh.bor (עַכְבּוֹר "Achbor" H5907H)
§ Abdon = "servile"
n pr m
1) a judge of Israel in the time of the judges; perhaps the same as 'Bedan'
2) a Benjamite, son of Shashak
3) a Gibeonite, son of Jehiel and a grandson of Gideon
4) son of Micah in the time of king Josiah of Judah; also 'Achbor'
n pr loc
5) a city in Asher allotted to the Gershonite Levites; located 10 miles (16 km) north of Accho; modern 'Abdeh'
